name: GPT-4o Search Preview
description: GPT-4o Search Preview is a specialized variant optimized for web search queries, with direct access to live web data and trained to understand and execute search operations.
notes: Dual pricing structure: $25 per 1K searches plus $30 per 1M tokens. Supports geolocation-based search customization. Generates responses in JSON format for API integration. Designed specifically for Chat Completions API with web_search_options parameter.
